import React, {forwardRef} from 'react' import '../index.css' import {Avatar} from '@material-ui/core' import VerifiedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/VerifiedUserRounded' import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ChatBubbleOutline' import RepeatIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Repeat' import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder' import PublishIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Publish' const Post = forwardRef(({displayName,username, verified,text,image, avatar}) => { return (

{displayName}{" "} {verified && } {username}

{text}

) }) export default Post
